br.br:
Check out our brand new mural (JUNE 2019) in the front foyer of our school!Â The mural depicts our young voyagers navigating the seas, knowing where they are going, and persevering no matter what comes their way!
Vision by: Kumu Sheena Alaiasa
Art by: Aljay Fuiamaono

div.strong:
Our Mission Statement:
â€‹At Pacific Heritage Academy we use the power of education, the endurance of language and culture, and the virtue of relationships and community, to help young people on voyages of discovery.
Through thoughtful inquiry, challenging curricula, rigorous requirements and compassionate service, students learn who they are and what they can become. We create learning experiences and students find their Roots & their Wings.

h2.font: MEET OUR DIRECTOR, KUMU SHEENA ALAIASA

strong.font: Learn more about Kumu Sheena by watching this video clip!

span.font: We welcome you with the spirit of Aloha!

td.div:
Pacific Heritage Academy
1755 W. 1100 N.
Salt Lake City, UT 84116
Walk-in tours are encouraged! Stop by anytime Monday-Friday between the hours of 8:00 - 4:00 and begin to discover how you can be a part of our educational journey.

span.style: display: block; clear: both; height: 0px; overflow: hidden;

div.h2:
We are Voyagers like ancestors of old. We are strong, inventive, courageous, and filled with wonder.
Sailing seas of knowledge, we seek understanding and use it with compassion.
Looking forward, we honor the past to better see our future. We will find hope and success in spite of wind and change.
With our eyes to the heavens, fixed on guiding lights, we know ourselves, our space, our time.
We will seek, we will find, we will know new horizons.
We are Mighty Voyagers!
â€‹
